attributes.action:
'individual' EU membership for UK citizens
Visa free, work and study.
attributes.additional_details:
The recent referendum was a protest about the country not providing the infrastructure and services for it's people before opening the doors to others.
The referendum was advisory and not legally binding, and no one, not even the leave party expected the outcome. 
Individual membership will provide an imcome to the EU, allow free movement without additional paperwork and checks. It is not for large groups to abuse a country's system, but to build friendships and bridges.
References available
attributes.background: There is a need for people, especially the young, to be able to move freely for travel and broaden their horizons, education, employment.

rejection.details:
Rule son EU citizenship are the responsibility of the EU, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133603
